product_name: A Walking Guide to the Hiking Trails in Minnesota's North Shore State Parks: Gooseberry Falls to Grand Portage
long_description: Take a guided tour through eight state parks located along Minnesota's North Shore of Lake Superior. Authors: Ron Morton and Steve Morse. Softcover; 297 pages; black-and-white maps. RockFlower Press; copyright 2007. Book is organized around easily recognizable waypoints, which are available at www.rockflowerpress.com for optional downloading to a GPS. Features walks for all ages and abilities: families, strollers, walkers and serious hikers. Each walk is rated for difficulty, and most walks featured are loops. Includes a glossary of geological terms used in the book and lists of common wildflowers that can be seen on the walks. Covers Gooseberry Falls, Split Rock, Tettegouche, George H. Crosby Manitou, Temperance River, Cascade River, Judge C.R. Magney and Grand Portage parks.
short_description: Take a guided tour through eight state parks located along Minnesota's North Shore of Lake Superior.
